CmdLine: set -x && 	apk --update --no-cache upgrade && 	apk --update --no-cache add python git iproute2 build-base tar && 	mkdir /tmp/libsodium && 	curl -Lk https://github.com/jedisct1/libsodium/releases/download/1.0.10/libsodium-1.0.10.tar.gz|tar xz -C /tmp/libsodium --strip-components=1 && 	cd /tmp/libsodium && 	./configure && 	make -j $(awk '/processor/{i++}END{print i}' /proc/cpuinfo) && 	make install && 	curl -Lk https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py | python && 	pip install cymysql && 	[ ! -d $(dirname ${DATA_DIR}) ] && mkdir -p $(dirname ${DATA_DIR}) && cd $(dirname ${DATA_DIR}) && 	git clone -b manyuser https://github.com/breakwa11/shadowsocks.git && 	apk --no-cache del build-base && 	rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* ~/.cache /tmp/libsodium
Commands.Name: run
